phrases: Let us create beautiful harmonies together, Wakana.
I think it is just a cold.
You did not have to come back.
I will make up a bed downstairs.
Tell me if you are in any pain at all.
The commencement of a new school year
is once again coming to an end.
However, you are still in the springtime of your lives.
The teacher said she has a cold.
You really think that is it?
She is been down for a while now.
Why do not you text her, if you are so worried?
And what if she does not respond?
Then it is probably because you annoy
Because she wants some time alone.
He says he is happy, too.
I was sweating, so I am going to change.
You can stay home from school until next week.
Step one says that good vocalization comes from correct posture.
Now use your glutes to slowly lower yourself down.
It is nothing exciting, but here.
Sawa paid for half of it.
Reminds me of my grandpa's house.
Did I tell you how much he loved the Condor Queens?
We sang their songs all the time!
Whenever he drank, he would always talk about the concerts he went to.
Then I would whine about how much I wish I could have been there.
And then, he would promise to take me to the next one!
Promises should always be kept, do not you think?
I made a promise with my mom.
She tried so hard to keep it...
I was too busy thinking about myself.
I do not know why she did not tell me she was sick.
If only she would told me...
You now, I am actually glad it never happened.
Once a promise is fulfilled, that is it.
But since it is still out there,
it makes me think of my grandpa.
It is another precious memory of him.
You have to make your own song.
But I do not know how!
Why do not we create your song together?
I will wash these clothes and get them back to you.
Think people'll know I am not wearing a bra?
I will treat you to rice flour dumplings next time.
After I took the picture, Wakana enjoyed the cake, I think, she wrote!
She is not one bit sorry.
I will make sure she gets it tomorrow at school.
Cannot wait to see you! <3 See Ya!
My mom wants you to know, that thing is done, so you can come pick it up anytime.
Cut it in the shape of a penguin.
All right, have a good day!
Shirahamazaka Choir Competition Free Choice Piece
We recorded it before going to nationals.
You can hear your mother's voice.
Wow, you were such a cutie, back in the day.
Hey, Wakana, are you free now?
Hold the reins, grip the saddle,
Your other foot, or you will end up backwards.
Like seeing a different world, yeah?
Try to maintain your balance by squeezing
But I am riding him this year in the mounted archery competition.
Your dad was the person on the moped, right?
He does not approve of me becoming an equestrian.
He says if I will not inherit the temple business,
I should be a government worker,
so I am not talking to him.
But if, for some reason, you could never see him again,
your last conversation would be that fight...
Want to try jogging a bit?
Do not pull on the reins; relax your arms.
Wow, that really works your muscles, huh?
Sabure just told me that he likes you.
You should come ride him again.
I have to get some things done, so I am leaving early.
I guess Operation Secret Morning Practice to Surprise the Group failed.
I want to get better, so I can be useful to you guys.
Wakana, what do you think we need most?
I told you there is no way we can improve on our own.
You are making a scary face and going Ah-ah!
No, I am trying to stay on pitch.
You have to treat voice exercises like they are a song.
Sing as if you are trying to tell someone you love,
who is far away, that you are doing well and having fun.
I guess a book cannot teach you everything.
By the way, Ms. Takahashi had her baby.
Tanaka-kun, sorry I could not stay and cheer for you
Wait, what was she even doing here?
Please take good care of yourself.
Please take good care of yourself.
Want to come over and see the baby?
I also have a favor to ask you.
You know that gelato shop by the train station?
The one next to the Japanese candy store.
I have not had a chance to go myself lately.
Babies are a lot of work.
but it pains me to think of how fast she will grow
into one of my loud-mouthed students.
Should a teacher be saying that?
Hey, I am off the clock right now.
Anyway, she does not have to be perfectly-behaved,
so long as she is happy and healthy.
Just put your right arm close to your side, and your left arm like so.
This here is what you call food.
I am hoping eating this will make you mend your lazy
Mom said that because it is close to my birthday,
you just celebrated them together after a while.
How did you propose to her?
I do not want to brag and say I was a ladies' man, but...
Why did not Mom tell me she was sick?
If she had, maybe we could have kept our promise.
I would have been nicer to her...
Your mom did not want you to be nice to her.
I do not want you to tell Wakana about my illness just yet.
She may be mature, but she gets sad too easily.
And her entrance exams are coming up.
But she is not a child anymore.
Yes, it might actually hurt her not to know...
Because we made a promise to write a song together.
A sad song about saying goodbye?
I feel like I can leave part of me in her heart.
I do not want it to be full of sadness, but kindness and strength.
that song will be there for her.
She can think of me whenever she hears it.
Remember how you rushed to the hospital,
without even closing the store, when Wakana was born?
Do you remember what you said when you first saw her?
I am so glad she grew up loving music.
I will never leave her alone.
She loved me so much, and I...
She would taken some notes for the song
she wanted to write with you once exams were over.
But then she was gone so fast...
I have been holding on to these,
waiting for you to come to terms with things.
I do not know anything about music, but...
Maybe you could continue it, somehow.
I would also like the hear the song you wrote together.
If you do not want it, I will take it.
I could not throw away such an important keepsake.
How could I get rid of it?
Your mom used it to propose to me.
Think I could leave it in here?
Do you mind if I take a look at this first?
I will start eating without you.
We will now sing a song
born between Nao and me, and nurtured by our choir.
A fresh wind races through the grass and leaves.
The view is clear, as far as the eye can see.
And now, a graceful light is flooding,
Even if you cannot see the stars
the future you are dreaming of
the days we spent with sparkling eyes.
our song echoing to the skies,
the days we spent with sparkling eyes,
the days we spent with beaming smiles.
You probably do not understand because you lack experience.
Episode 7 Spinning in Circles and Losing Sight
